statements: UPDATE ad_revenue SET revenue = 1500.25, ad_type = 'banner' WHERE video_id = '1ef7127c-7499-4b22-b024-4023ea435730';
UPDATE ad_revenue SET timestamp = '2022-10-05 13:30:45+00', ad_duration = '30 minutes' WHERE video_id = '3b8eacc9-8b82-41f9-aeef-e6911260c10e';
UPDATE ad_revenue SET revenue = 1500.00, ad_type = 'banner' WHERE video_id = 'c7137fb3-3703-4693-80a1-01f1e929a86e';
UPDATE ad_revenue SET timestamp = '2022-05-15 09:30:00.000+00:00', ad_duration = '30 minutes' WHERE video_id = 'e83912e8-6147-487d-9d5f-ccfbdcb36b89';
UPDATE video_content SET video_title = 'Updated Title 1' WHERE video_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE ad_metrics SET ad_clicks = 100, ad_revenue = 250.50 WHERE ad_id = 'xyz456';
UPDATE video_content SET video_title = 'New Title', ad_revenue = 1500.00 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE ad_metrics SET ad_clicks = 100, ad_revenue = 500.25 WHERE ad_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE video_content SET views = 1000, revenue = 2500.00 WHERE video_id = '1a1884a5-305b-4747-818d-893584e07e99';
UPDATE ad_campaign SET cost = 1500.50, ads_served = 500 WHERE campaign_id = '2fe9d9a8-89ef-412f-b5cb-9dcf3d83e8c4';
UPDATE video_content SET views = views + 100, revenue = revenue * 1.05 WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE ad_campaign SET cost = cost + 5000, ads_served = ads_served * 1.2 WHERE campaign_id = '8df84511-5185-4b28-8946-d448b2b91cb6';
UPDATE Videos SET views = 100 WHERE video_id = 1;
UPDATE Advertisements SET cost_per_click = 0.5 WHERE ad_id = 5;
UPDATE Videos SET views = views + 100, title = 'Updated Title' WHERE video_id = 1;
UPDATE Revenue SET revenue_amount = revenue_amount * 1.2, date = '2022-05-15' WHERE revenue_id = 3;
UPDATE video_content SET views_count = 10000 WHERE video_id = 12345;
UPDATE ad_clicks SET user_id = 9876, click_time = '2023-01-05 15:30:00' WHERE click_id = 54321;
UPDATE video_content SET views_count = views_count + 100, ad_revenue = ad_revenue + 25.50 WHERE video_id = 123
UPDATE ad_campaign SET status = 'Paused', total_budget = total_budget - 500.00 WHERE campaign_id = 456
